title: Substation Cybersecurity Check
description: A cybersecurity analyst is reviewing logs from a substation's intelligent electronic devices (IEDs) for signs of unauthorized access.

tasks.description: Collect access logs from all relays, meters, and controllers in the substation.
tasks.expected_outcome: System gathers all relevant security logs.

tasks.description: Analyze the logs for any failed login attempts or access from unrecognized IP addresses.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analysis shows no anomalous access attempts.

tasks.description: Verify that the firmware on all devices is up to date and patched for known vulnerabilities.
tasks.expected_outcome: System confirms all devices are running the latest approved firmware.
